name: gbt
description: An efficient re-implementation of the getBlockTemplate algorithm in Rust

scripts.build: npm install --no-save @napi-rs/cli@3.0.0-alpha.80 && npm run check-cargo-version && napi build --platform
scripts.check-cargo-version: VER=$(cat rust-toolchain) ; if ! cargo version | grep "cargo $VER" >/dev/null ; then echo -e "\033[1;35m[[[[WARNING]]]]: cargo version mismatch with ./rust-toolchain version ($VER)!!!\033[0m" >&2; fi
scripts.to-backend: FD=${FD:-../../backend/rust-gbt/} ; rm -rf $FD && mkdir $FD && cp index.js index.d.ts package.json *.node $FD

author: mononaut
